text: “Ekiweebwayo bwe kinaabanga ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa1:3 ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa Ebika by’ensolo bisatu bye byaweebwangayo okuba ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa, okusinziira ku mbeera y’omuntu awaayo ssaddaaka: ente sseddume yaweebwangayo abantu abagagga; endiga n’embuzi (lunny 10) n’ebinyonyi (lunny 14) byaweebwangayo abantu abaavu (5:7; 12:8) nga kiva mu kiraalo ky’ente, anaawangayo seddume etaliiko kamogo. Anaagyereeteranga n’agiweerayo ku mulyango gwa Weema ya Mukama ey’Okukuŋŋaanirangamu, kiryoke kikkirizibwe eri Mukama.
